H0.text: The nickname for Dumfries became the name of which Scottish football club. Doonhamers FC

H1.text: The nickname for Dumfries became the name of which Scottish football club. Dumfries United

H2.text: The nickname for Dumfries became the name of which Scottish football club. Solway Stars

H3.text: The nickname for Dumfries became the name of which Scottish football club. Qots

A4.text: People from Dumfries are known colloquially in Scots language as Doonhamers.

A5.text: Dumfries is nicknamed Queen of the South.
